name: emergency_call
description: A Website to send emergency message to the Medical/Fire/Police Departments.

scripts.usemin: usemin contact_us.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/contact_us.html && usemin about_us.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/about_us.html && usemin index.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/index.html && usemin fire.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/fire.html && usemin login.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/login.html && usemin medical.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/medical.html && usemin police.html -d Distribution --htmlmin -o Distribution/police.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyimage && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin

author: Utkarsh Gupta
